metadata.title: CVE-2018-7247 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in pixHtmlViewer in prog/htmlviewer.c in Leptonicabefore 1.75.3. Unsanitized input (rootname) can overflow a buffer, leadingpotentially to arbitrary code execution or possibly unspecified otherimpact.

criterions.comment: leptonlib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
